data.name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe
data.detailed_description:
By purchasing this DLC you immediately get access to the entire content of the game (not including the content from other DLC) without any restrictions on the level of the player's profile.
In CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe includes:
  • Free access to all traks without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all vehicles without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all elements of customization of the body of the car without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all discs without any level restrictions

data.short_description: By purchasing this DLC you immediately get access to the entire content of the game (not including the content from other DLC) without any restrictions on the level of the player's profile.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 or 3.00 GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB (GeForce 8800 GT / Radeon HD 2900 PRO)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHzIntel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti 1 GB, Radeon HD 7770 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
